message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $18,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, even more so than my initial asking price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit tight on budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but  $12,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $13,500
